name: schedule-buddy
description: A site to simplify the scheduling process, specifically at Miami University.
author: Hilarious Atlantic

scripts.database: brew services start postgresql && createuser schedule_buddy --createdb --superuser
scripts.setup-server: cd server/ && go get && cd ../ && go build -o start-server server/*.go && ./start-server resetdb && ./start-server import
scripts.setup: npm run setup-server && npm run setup-client
